name: Mastiff

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 3 (1d4+1) piercing damage. If the target is a creature  it makes a DC 11 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The mastiff has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.

document__title: Level Up Advanced 5e Monstrous Menagerie OGL
